tokenBuyBack.title: DOUGH buyback
tokenBuyBack.description: We offer a fixed USDC price for your DOUGH bags. We'll take good care of them.

tokenBuyBack.title: eDOUGH buyback
tokenBuyBack.description: We offer a fixed USDC price for your eDOUGH tokens. No vesting limitations.

tokenBuyBack.title: eDOUGH for veDOUGH
tokenBuyBack.description: Has your eDOUGH been vesting for more than 6 months? If so, you can bridge it to veDough
